title: Claret Glass
description: a) Circular platform on three feet, with full looped handle rising from center, and four radiating rings into which four bottle shapes (f / i) are fitted . b), c) Two tall wine glasses on ribbon-twist stems. d), e) Two clear claret glasses.

tombstone.epitaph:
Claret Glass.
glass. Gift of Hamill and Barker. 1962-144-3-a/i.
